attributes.description: Engine power output: 121kW/213Nm Features include : Electronic power assist steering; 17” Alloy Wheels; Automatic On/Off LED headlamps; LED Front fog lights; Auto headlamp levelling; Front rain-sensing wipers; Advanced keyless push-button engine start; Smart Advanced Keyless entry 6 Airbags SRS: Front (driver and passenger, side and curtain); Hill Launch Assist (HLA); Anti-lock Braking System (ABS); Electronic Brake-force Distribution (EBD); Emergency Brake Assist (EBA); Electronic Park Brake (EPB); Dynamic Stability Control (DSC); G-Vectoring Control (GVC) Plus; Power windows with one-touch system (front and rear); Leather seats. Driver seat – 8-way power adjustable with power lumbar support – Driver; 40:20:40 folding rear seats; Rear centre armrest with 2 USB ports and cupholders; Dual-zone climate control Aircon; Cruise control; Leather-wrapped Multifunctional steering wheel with audio controls and cruise control; Tilt and telescopic adjustable steering wheel; Front centre console armrest; Leather-wrapped gear shift knob; Reverse Camera; Auto door lock; MZD Connect system 8” display screen and CD player/AUX jack/2 USB ports; 6 Speakers; Bluetooth® handsfree connection; Internet radio integration (Pandora®, Sticher and AHA); Commander dial; Apple CarPlay™ and Android Auto™; Auto-fold mirrors, Auto-dimming rearview mirror; ISOFIX.
